local_intent: place: detect red plate, move to center, lower until contact, verify contact, open gripper, retreat
assumptions: Gripper open or can open prior to placement
Red plate visible or detectable in current frame
Force sensor available for contact detection
coherence_with_global: Follows GLOBAL_BT placement phase: perceives red plate, moves to center, lowers until contact (as annotated), releases via OpenGripper, and retreats. Retry decorators add recovery consistent with failure_and_recovery.
